attributes.action: create a strong Climate Change Bill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The draft climate change bill that is currently going through parliament must be strengthened in the following ways:

1) An 80% cut in CO2 emissions by 2050 must be achieved.
2) Shipping and aviation emissions must be included.
3) Year on year carbon targets must be created.

Please sign this petition to put pressure on the Gordon Brown and the government to do the right thing.
